typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lccadddescrlev1 as string,
		lccadddescrlev2 as string,
		lccadddescrlev3 as string,
		lccadddescrlev4 as string,
		lccadditionaltxt as string,
		lccadjuster as string,
		lccalleged1 as string,
		lccalleged2 as string,
		lccallegedtxt as string,
		lccamount as decimal(38,18),
		lccamtdispunknown as string,
		lcccargotype as string,
		lcccarriagemethod as string,
		lcccause as string,
		lcccausetxt as string,
		lccclmamtynsw as string,
		lccclmdet as string,
		lccclmtype as string,
		lccclupcommenced as decimal(38,18),
		lccclupcompleted as decimal(38,18),
		lccconseq as string,
		lccconseqos as string,
		lcccurr as string,
		lccdecision as decimal(38,18),
		lccdisembarkedat as string,
		lccdisembarkeddate as timestamp,
		lccdisembarkiso as string,
		lccembarkedat as string,
		lccembarkeddate as timestamp,
		lccembarkiso as string,
		lccemergevac as string,
		lccfduty as decimal(38,18),
		lccgrossamount as decimal(38,18),
		lccgrosssettle as decimal(38,18),
		lcchandlebyclms as string,
		lccinitcontpoint as string,
		lccinlitigation as string,
		lccjurisdiction as string,
		lccladid as decimal(38,18),
		lcclcaid as string,
		lcclccid as string,
		lcclightcccid as string,
		lccln6 as decimal(38,18),
		lccloconvess as string,
		lccloconvesstxt as string,
		lccmafareatxt as string,
		lccmaffectarea as string,
		lccmanos as string,
		lccmanouver as string,
		lccmfkey as string,
		lccnpersons as decimal(38,18),
		lccothshipname as string,
		lccpeaid as decimal(38,18),
		lccpilotname as string,
		lccpilotonboard as string,
		lccpollutant as string,
		lccradnavynsw as string,
		lccrecovccvid as decimal(38,18),
		lccrecovcom as string,
		lccrecovcurr as string,
		lccrecovery as decimal(38,18),
		lccrecovyn as string,
		lccremarks as string,
		lccrolecat as string,
		lccrule as string,
		lccruleofcov as string,
		lccsettlement as decimal(38,18),
		lcctext as string,
		lcctrtmco as decimal(38,18),
		lccuwsign as string,
		lccvessdevi as string,
		lccvisiblcccid as string,
		lccvoyagefr as string,
		lccvoyageto as string,
		lccvoyfriso as string,
		lccvoytoiso as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Lcc
source(output(
		lcaacstat as string,
		lcaadjsign as string,
		lcaagaid as string,
		lcaareacd as string,
		lcaareadescr as string,
		lcaautosetleyn as string,
		lcabigevent as string,
		lcabirtno as string,
		lcabonynsw as string,
		lcacagtyp as string,
		lcacalclamtfrinjured as string,
		lcacategorytype as string,
		lcacattype as string,
		lcaccod2 as string,
		lcaccod2date as timestamp,
		lcaccod2trmtdate as timestamp,
		lcaccod2txt35 as string,
		lcacefocc as string,
		lcacefocm as string,
		lcacefouc as string,
		lcaclintc as decimal(38,18),
		lcaclmcac as string,
		lcaclmdate as timestamp,
		lcaclmdatechd as string,
		lcaclmid as decimal(38,18),
		lcaclmintynsw as string,
		lcaclmn3 as decimal(38,18),
		lcaclmpeaid as decimal(38,18),
		lcaclmtype as string,
		lcaclodate as timestamp,
		lcacndid as string,
		lcacommonynsw as string,
		lcacompllevel as string,
		lcaconflictclm as string,
		lcacrdate as timestamp,
		lcacrobbid as string,
		lcacrsign as string,
		lcacyear as decimal(38,18),
		lcaecauseco as string,
		lcaecfid as string,
		lcaeclid as string,
		lcaecoid as string,
		lcaenassshr as decimal(38,18),
		lcaenintrst as string,
		lcaeuoffpros as decimal(38,18),
		lcaeuownpros as decimal(38,18),
		lcaexppdate as timestamp,
		lcaextadjynsw as string,
		lcaextclmid as string,
		lcafileref as decimal(38,18),
		lcafinalstatmdate as timestamp,
		lcafoadate as timestamp,
		lcafpareacd as string,
		lcafromareacd as string,
		lcageodescr as string,
		lcahour as decimal(38,18),
		lcaicaid as string,
		lcaimpexp as decimal(38,18),
		lcainsamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcainscurr as string,
		lcainsured as decimal(38,18),
		lcainsuredmno as string,
		lcainsuredmof as string,
		lcaintnote as string,
		lcaisrndcontrssigned as string,
		lcajurisdiction as string,
		lcaknvmark as string,
		lcalabid as string,
		lcalcaid as string,
		lcaldescr as string,
		lcaliabcode as decimal(38,18),
		lcaliabtxt as string,
		lcalimamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcalimcurr as string,
		lcalimdays as decimal(38,18),
		lcalimdedamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcalimrenewed as decimal(38,18),
		lcaloadate as timestamp,
		lcalodescr as string,
		lcalossco as string,
		lcalrgclmynsw as string,
		lcaltdate as timestamp,
		lcaludate as timestamp,
		lcalusign as string,
		lcamanhavsalaer as string,
		lcamfkey as string,
		lcamoveddate as timestamp,
		lcamovedsign as string,
		lcamovedto as string,
		lcamplamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcamplcurr as string,
		lcamuoffgrp as decimal(38,18),
		lcamuoffpros as decimal(38,18),
		lcamuownpros as decimal(38,18),
		lcan1nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan2nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan3nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan4nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan5nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan6nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan7nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcan8nooftreatm as decimal(38,18),
		lcancauseco as string,
		lcanextdate as timestamp,
		lcanextsign as string,
		lcanmclef as string,
		lcanoofpers as decimal(38,18),
		lcaobno as decimal(38,18),
		lcaoccoffdate as timestamp,
		lcaoccoffynsw as string,
		lcaoccownynsw as string,
		lcaoffice as decimal(38,18),
		lcaonoffs as decimal(38,18),
		lcaoutstm as string,
		lcapilotonboard as string,
		lcaportcccid as string,
		lcaportunlid as string,
		lcaprepayamtp as decimal(38,18),
		lcaprepaycurr as string,
		lcaprocess as string,
		lcarecovachamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcarecovachcurr as string,
		lcarecovachdate as timestamp,
		lcarecovachintnote as string,
		lcarecovachsign as string,
		lcarecovachynsw as string,
		lcarecovccvid as decimal(38,18),
		lcarecovpotamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcarecovpotcurr as string,
		lcarecovpotintnote as string,
		lcarecovpotynsw as string,
		lcarecovremdate as timestamp,
		lcareduceprem as string,
		lcaregamt as decimal(38,18),
		lcaregcurr as string,
		lcaregndate as timestamp,
		lcaregnsign as string,
		lcaregress as decimal(38,18),
		lcaregtext70 as string,
		lcarepdate as timestamp,
		lcaresumtionfrom as string,
		lcataucode as decimal(38,18),
		lcatautxt as string,
		lcataxno as string,
		lcatcauseco as string,
		lcatimnote as string,
		lcatlotype as decimal(38,18),
		lcatmcloludate as timestamp,
		lcatmclolusign as string,
		lcatmduedate as timestamp,
		lcatmextdocid as decimal(38,18),
		lcatmextduedate as timestamp,
		lcatmextludate as timestamp,
		lcatmextlusign as string,
		lcatmludate as timestamp,
		lcatmlusign as string,
		lcatmstatus as string,
		lcatoareacd as string,
		lcatranme as string,
		lcatranty as decimal(38,18),
		lcatrtmco as decimal(38,18),
		lcatzone as string,
		lcauwsign as string,
		lcawocdate as timestamp,
		lcawocstat as string,
		lcaworkplace as decimal(38,18),
		lcawrkclaim as decimal(38,18),
		lcawrkplccod as decimal(38,18),
		lcaxlmref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Lca
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code_type_id as double,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		code_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCross
source(output(
		clm_source_system as string,
		clm_code as string,
		clm_source_key as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		pk_key_clm as string,
		clm_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_claim_type.parquet']) ~> ClmType
Lcc select(mapColumn(
		lcclcaid,
		lccclmtype,
		lcclccid,
		lccmfkey,
		lccalleged1,
		lccalleged2,
		lcccarriagemethod,
		lcccause,
		lccloconvess,
		lccruleofcov,
		lcctext,
		lccclmdet,
		lccuwsign,
		lccln6,
		lccremarks,
		lcctrtmco,
		lccrolecat,
		each(match(left(name,7)=='lccaddd'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LccTable
Lca select(mapColumn(
		lcalcaid,
		lcaclmdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LcaTable
LccTable, LcaTable join(lcclcaid == lcalcaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccLca
LccLca derive(scl_sub_claim_key = concat('P',lcclccid),
		scl_clm_key = concat('PARIS',lccclmtype),
		scl_inc_key = concat('P',lcalcaid),
		scl_alleged_cause_key = case(iifNull(lccalleged2,'Null') =='Null', lccalleged1, lccalleged2),
		scl_alleged_caused_top_key = lccalleged1,
		scl_carriage_method_key = trim(lcccarriagemethod),
		scl_cause_of_injury_key = lcccause,
		scl_claim_type_spec_key = iifNull(lccadddescrlev4, iifNull(lccadddescrlev3,iifNull(lccadddescrlev2,lccadddescrlev1))),
		scl_rule_of_cover = lccruleofcov,
		scl_claim_detail_key = trim(lccclmdet),
		scl_employee_key = lccuwsign,
		scl_clm_status_key = toString(lcctrtmco),
		scl_human_clm_loc_key = lccloconvess,
		scl_title_rank_key = lccrolecat,
		scl_sub_claim_desc = lcctext,
		scl_sub_claim_number = lccln6) ~> Expressions
TCross filter(code_type_id == 819 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> AllegedCause
AllegedCause select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_all_cau = source_code_key,
		target_code_all_cau = target_code,
		target_description_all_cau = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefAllegedCause
TCross filter(code_type_id == 820 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> CarriageMethod
CarriageMethod select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_CarriageMethod = source_code_key,
		target_code_CarriageMethod = target_code,
		target_description_CarriageMethod = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefCarriageMethod
TCross filter(code_type_id == 327 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> CauseOfInjury
TCross filter(code_type_id == 821 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> ClaimTypeSpec
ClaimTypeSpec select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_clm_type_spec = source_code_key,
		target_code_clm_type_spec = target_code,
		target_description_clm_type_spec = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefClaimTypeSpec
CauseOfInjury select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_cause_injury = source_code_key,
		target_code_cause_injury = target_code,
		target_description_cause_injury = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefCauseOfInjury
TCross filter(code_type_id == 167 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> RuleOfCover
RuleOfCover select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_roc = source_code_key,
		target_code_roc = target_code,
		target_description_roc = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefRuleOfCover
TCross filter(code_type_id == 775 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> ClaimDetail
ClaimDetail select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_claim_detail = source_code_key,
		target_code_claim_detail = target_code,
		target_description_claim_detail = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefClaimDetail
TCross filter(code_type_id == 822 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> Status
Status select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_status = source_code_key,
		target_code_status = target_code,
		target_description_status = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefStatus
TCross filter(code_type_id == 824 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> HumanClaimLocation
HumanClaimLocation select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_hcl = source_code_key,
		target_code_hcl = target_code,
		target_description_hcl = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefHumanClmLoc
TCross filter(code_type_id == 311 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> TitleRank
TitleRank select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_TitleRank = source_code_key,
		target_code_TitleRank = target_code,
		target_description_TitleRank = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefTitleRank
Expressions select(mapColumn(
		each(match(left(name, 3) == 'scl'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColums
SelectedColums, PreDimClmType join(scl_clm_key == pk_key_clm,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccClmType
ClmType select(mapColumn(
		clm_code,
		pk_key_clm,
		clm_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimClmType
LccClmType, XrefAllegedCause join(scl_alleged_cause_key == source_code_key_all_cau,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LccAllegedCause
LccAllegedCause, XrefAllCausedTop join(scl_alleged_caused_top_key == source_code_key_allcautop,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AllegeCauseTop
TCross filter(code_type_id == 819 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> AllegedCauseTop
AllegedCauseTop select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_allcautop = source_code_key,
		target_description_allcautop = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefAllCausedTop
AllegeCauseTop, XrefCarriageMethod join(scl_carriage_method_key == source_code_key_CarriageMethod,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AllCauTopCarriageMthod
AllCauTopCarriageMthod, XrefCauseOfInjury join(scl_cause_of_injury_key == source_code_key_cause_injury,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CarriageCauseInjury
CarriageCauseInjury, XrefRuleOfCover join(scl_rule_of_cover == source_code_key_roc,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CauseRuleOfCover
CauseRuleOfCover, XrefClaimDetail join(scl_claim_detail_key == source_code_key_claim_detail,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RuleCoverClmDetail
RuleCoverClmDetail, XrefEmployee join(scl_employee_key == source_code_key_employee,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClmDetEmployee
TCross filter(code_type_id == 329 && source_system == 'PARIS') ~> Employee
Employee select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_employee = source_code_key,
		target_code_employee = target_code,
		target_description_employee = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefEmployee
ClmDetEmployee, XrefStatus join(scl_clm_status_key == source_code_key_status,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmployeeStatus
EmployeeStatus, XrefHumanClmLoc join(scl_human_clm_loc_key == source_code_key_hcl,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EmployeeHuman
EmployeeHuman, XrefTitleRank join(scl_title_rank_key == source_code_key_TitleRank,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> HumanTitleRank
HumanTitleRank derive(scl_sub_claim_type_code = clm_code,
		scl_sub_claim_type_description = clm_description,
		scl_sub_claim_detail_code = iifNull(target_code_claim_detail,'N/A'),
		scl_sub_claim_detail_description = iifNull(target_description_claim_detail,'Not Applicable'),
		scl_rule_of_cover_code = iifNull(target_code_roc, 'N/A'),
		scl_rule_of_cover_description = iifNull(target_description_roc, 'Not Applicable'),
		scl_sub_claim_handler_code = iifNull(target_code_hcl, 'N/A'),
		scl_sub_claim_handler_description = iifNull(target_description_hcl, 'Not Applicable')) ~> DerivedColumn1
